creator: plinehan@plinehan.com
text:
The following file has incorrect MD5 and SHA1 checksums:

http://www.devlib.org/apache/ant/binaries/apache-ant-1.7.0-bin.tar.gz

I have verified this by downloading the file onto both a Windows and Linux
machine.  The checksums on both platforms match, and neither of them match the
expected checksum.

I downloaded the file from the "master" site and it does have the correct
checksums, so the issue is not my (or my computer's) ability to compute
checksums. :)

The "bad" file unzips correctly, so it is not simply a case of corruption.

I have not bothered to check the other files on that mirror for problems.

Thanks for reporting.

The version currently available is / seems to be ok.
creator: jkf@apache.org
